product_description: The Wahl compact Lithium-Ion Shaver Kit features hygienic rinseable foils and a long hair cutter bar. The Flexible foils along with our advanced foils patterns moves with the contours of your face, providing a more comfortable shave. This rechargeable electric shaver features 120 minutes of run time with a charge time of 1.5 hours and a 5-minute quick charge for 10 minutes of power. The compact size and ergonomics of this electric shaver make it the ideal option for looking your best while traveling and at home; hold down the power button and the travel lock will engage to keep your unit safe during travel. This kit comes with a foil guard that protects the foils from accidental damage when not in use, a cleaning brush for removing excess shaved hairs, a power cord to charge your shaver, and an instruction book. Wahl clippers, trimmers, & shavers are available in a variety of styles to meet your home hair cutting needs. From Lithium Ion cordless & rechargeable clippers to heavy-duty corded models. Note: We test our shavers for cutting performance prior to packaging with a hygienic fiber. We do our best to clean the product to remove any testing particles, but it is possible a few may remain. They are not hair and can be simply wiped off. First time electric shaver users will have an adjustment period while skin adjusts to the new foils. This period of conditioning is described in the Instruction Booklet included with this kit, along with instructions for navigating this period of conditioning while skin adjusts to the new shaving technique.

Use it dry for quick touch-ups or in the shower with shaving gel. With up to 30 minutes of cordless runtime and a rechargeable design, it’s your go-to grooming tool for smooth skin anywhere, anytime.

name: Series 3 310s Wet & Dry Electric Shaver for Men/Rechargeable Electric Razor, Blue
short_description: Braun Series 3 310s Men's Electric Shaver with Protective Cap and Smart Plug (for automatic 100-240 voltage adjustment)
3 pressure-sensitive shaving elements include a middle trimmer for difficult hairs along with twin foils for ultimate closeness and skin comfort
The super thin head on this face and beard trimmer allows you to easily shave hard-to-reach areas
Durable, cordless electric razor is 100% waterproof up to negative 5 meters for versatile shaving and easy cleaning
Wet and dry men's electric razors can be used with water, foam or gel for an even better gliding experience and a smoother skin feeling
Two rechargeable NiMh batteries fully charge in one hour for 30 minutes of shave time or quick-charge in 5 minutes for one shave
product_description: Tough on beards and smooth on the skin, Braun Series 3 Electric Shavers for men provide a comfortable and efficient shaving experience. This face and beard shaver features three pressure-sensitive shaving elements (3-Flex head) that automatically retract to protect your skin and adapt perfectly to facial contours for a close and gentle shave. Braun's patented SensoFoil (twin foils) protects your skin from the ultra-sharp blades while working together with an integrated middle trimmer to effectively cut both long and short hairs. The full shaving power of the Series 3 is built in a super thin head, allowing you to easily reach difficult areas like under the nose. This wet and dry foil shaver is 100% waterproof and can be used with foam, gel or even under the shower. Plus, you can conveniently rinse the electric shaver under running water for easy cleaning. These rechargeable shavers for men include two powerful NiMH batteries with quick charge technology to provide a full shave after only one 5-minute quick charge. All Series 3 electric razors for men are made in Germany with premium craftsmanship. This Braun Series 3 Electric Shaver comes with a 100-day money-back guarantee.

short_description: THE HANDYMAN: Our precision compact electric foil face shaver is equipped with a dual-action SkinSafe blade head that includes a long-hair leveler and a foil shaver blade.

SHAVE TIME: Don’t get left in the scruff. Our quick charging Li-ion battery gives you up to 60 minutes of run time to get your groom on. If you’re short on time, the 5-minute quick charge will give you enough juice to clean things up.
GROOM ON THE GO: Whether you've got a spur-of-the-moment overnight or a fringe friend’s destination wedding, The Handyman packs light and trims easy with a mess-free, magnetic protective cover.
KEEP IT CLEAN: Go ahead, run it under the faucet - it's waterproof*. *IPX7 rated to protect against immersion in up to one meter of fresh water for up to 30 minutes.

HOW TO USE: Hold The Handyman electric face shaver with both blades flat against the skin and gently glide our dual-action compact foil shaver up and down. With every stroke, the long-hair leveler trims down growth while the foil brings the shave down to the skin.
